site_name: Servicing yard to rear of the Duke of York Headquarters, LONDON, SW3
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 9c and 9d (Submission of details - (c) Elevational drawings and through-sections (scale 1:10) of all external windows and elevational drawings (scale 1:10) of all external doors, including louvred and service doors; and (d) Elevational drawings (scale 1:10) of new railings.) of planning permission 24/07812 (Variation of Condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/23/08508, for public realm improvement works within servicing yard to rear of Duke of york Square.)
